title: Sword Of The Stars The Pit Gold Edition (Update 3 Patch) (GOG)
description:
Guys, here the latest version of sots. It includes the new update for sots gold edition and mindgames. Installation notes and change notes below.

Please Install the game in this order.

1. Maingame
2. "Mindegames" DLC
3. "Mindegames" DLC Update
4. Gold Edition Upgrade

Sword of The Stars The Pit Gold Edition (1.2.3 Change Notes)

- Hiver Queen can no longer block the ladder going to the next floor. 
- AI now properly accounts for creatures changing sides. 
- Knockback now effects moving turrets. 
- Doohanulator not reducing task times for some tasks. 

Changes and Additions 
- Coding Avatar must now be manually equipped. 
- Motheregg properly gives player control of target. 
- Added: New stuff(ing) for Thanksgiving


Sword of The Stars The Pit Gold Edition Mind games (1.1.10 Change Notes)

"Win Trio" award fixed. 
- Potential crash loading final floor on some machines fixed.
